tool_description:
API for Hummingbird, the easiest way to track, share and discover new anime. 

Free for non-commercial use.
name: Hummingbird v1
title: Hummingbird v1

api_list.name: Anime
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://hummingbirdv1.p.rapidapi.com/anime/steins-gate"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "hummingbirdv1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://hummingbirdv1.p.rapidapi.com/anime/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "hummingbirdv1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
